message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,200,000. Let me know if this is something you'd like to consider.
Alice, your offer is still above my budget.  I'm interested in this product, but I can only go up to $850,000.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $850,000 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $1,100,000. This is my final offer in this range.

Alice, I understand your need to make a profit, but $1,100,000 is still outside of my range. I'm willing to go up to $900,000. This is my final offer.  If we can't agree on this, I'll have to explore other options.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900,000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, and I can offer it to you for $1,050,000. This is my final offer in this negotiation.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. However, I'm still not comfortable going above $950,000. This is my absolute final offer. If you're not willing to accept this, I'll have to purchase the product from John.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950,000. I'm willing to make one last attempt to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $1,025,000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
